item.title: YTL International Recalls Log Splitters Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The log splitter’s welding on the tongue box assembly can crack and cause the log splitter tank to disconnect from the rest of unit, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: H.I.S. Recalls Girl’s Clothing Sets Due to Violation of Federal Lead Content Ban
item.description: The metal pendant on the necklace contains levels of lead that exceed the federal lead content ban. Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health issues.

item.title: Lifetone Technology Recalls Bedside Fire Alarm and Clocks Due to Failure to Fully Alert Consumers to a Fire
item.description: The bedside fire alarm and clock can fail to operate and fully alert consumers to a fire.

item.title: American Honda Recalls Recreational Off-Highway Vehicles Due to Fire and Burn Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: An incorrectly installed throttle body can ignite, posing fire and burn hazards to consumers.

item.title: Mountain Warehouse Recalls Children’s Water Bottles Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The water bottle’s spout can detach, exposing a small ring, posing a choking hazard to children.

item.title: A. O. Smith Recalls 30-Gallon Gas Water Heaters Due to Fire Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Lowe’s
item.description: The water heater’s flame arrestor can fail to work properly, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: A. O. Smith Recalls Ultra-Low NOx Water Heaters Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The water heater’s gas burner screen develops tears. The water heater’s burner can then create excess radiant heat, posing a fire hazard if the water heater is installed directly on a wood or other combustible floor.

item.title: Kubota Recalls Mowers and Compact Tractors Due to Burn Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: Hot coolant can spray out onto consumers from the overheated and pressurized coolant reservoir tank, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: MCS Industries Recalls Glacier Bay Medicine Cabinets Due to Laceration Hazard; Sold Exclusively at The Home Depot
item.description: The mirror can detach from the medicine cabinet door, posing a laceration hazard to consumers.

item.title: Pain Relief Naturally Recalls Pain and Itch Relief Creams, Sprays and Gels Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The packaging is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain and itch relief creams, sprays and gels contain lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children if they put it on their skin or ingest it.

item.title: Black & Decker Recalls Hammer Drills Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The side handle sold with the drill can slip or break, leading to a loss of control of the tool, posing an injury hazard

item.title: CFMOTO Recalls Recreational Off-Highway Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle pedal can be pushed past the throttle stop and not return to the idle position, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Fantasia Accessories Recalls Slap Bracelets Due to Laceration Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The slap bracelet’s metal wristband can pierce the protective fabric around it and expose sharp edges, posing a laceration hazard to young children.

item.title: Children’s Toy Instrument Sets Recalled Due to Violation of the Federal Lead Paint Ban; Made by Creative Sto and Sold Exclusively at Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
item.description: Paint on the maracas, xylophone and carrying case contains levels of lead that exceed the federal lead paint ban. Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health issues.

item.title: i play Recalls Infant Rattles Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: Pieces of the rattle can detach, posing a choking hazard to infants.

item.title: CB2 Recalls Pendant Lights Due to Fire and Shock Hazards
item.description: The insulation on the electrical wiring can come loose, posing fire and shock hazards.

item.title: Haier America Recalls Top-Mount Refrigerators Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: An electrical component in the refrigerator can short circuit, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Waupaca Elevator Recalls to Inspect Elevators Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The elevator cab can fall unexpectedly to the bottom of the elevator shaft and abruptly stop, posing an injury hazard to consumers in the elevator cab.

item.title: Shadescapes Recalls Pool and Patio Umbrellas Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The umbrella arm can break while in use, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Pacific Cycle Recalls Adult Men’s Mountain Bicycles Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The downtube on the bicycles can crack, posing a fall hazard

item.title: Shimano Recalls Bicycle Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury
item.description: The bicycle helmets do not comply with the federal safety standard for bicycle helmets, posing a risk of head injury.

item.title: Yvolve Sports Recalls Electric Skateboards Due to to Fall Hazard; New Instructions and Warning Labels Provided
item.description: The tire on the skateboard can deflate, posing a fall hazard to the user.

item.title: Cub Cadet Recalls Zero-Turn Riding Mowers Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The fuel tank’s neck can crack and cause fuel to leak, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Cub Cadet Recalls Utility Vehicles Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The fuel tank’s neck can crack and cause fuel to leak, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Huish Outdoors Recalls Buoyancy Control Devices (BCDs) Due to Drowning Hazard
item.description: Buttons on the Zeagle Sport BCD inflators can break or fracture leading to a rapid loss of air or auto inflation of the BCD, posing a drowning hazard to scuba divers.

item.title: Brookstone Wireless Speakers Recalled Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The lithium ion batteries in the wireless speakers can overheat and catch fire, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Vista Railing Systems Recalls ProBuilt Aluminum Posts Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The posts can separate from base, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: Hydrolevel Recalls Controllers for Slant/Fin Boilers Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: A malfunction in the recalled controller can cause the boiler to overheat, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Flushmate® Recalls Flushmate II 501-B Pressure-Assisted Flushing Systems Due to Impact and Laceration Hazards
item.description: The system can burst at or near the vessel weld seam releasing stored pressure. This pressure can lift the tank lid and shatter the tank, posing impact and laceration hazards to consumers and property damage.

item.title: Kikkerland Recalls Wireless Charger Bedside Pockets Due to Fire and Burn Hazard
item.description: The wireless charger bedside pockets can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Gold Recalls Eddie Bauer Infant Carriers Due to Fall Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The buckles on the infant carriers can break, posing a fall hazard to children.

item.title: Abond Group Recalls Tubeez Baby Bath Support Seats Due to Drowning Hazard
item.description: The bath support seat fails to meet the federal safety standard including the requirements for stability. The bath seat can tip over or an infant can slip underneath the front support, posing a drowning hazard.

item.title: Cooper Lighting Recalls Solar/Battery Powered Light Fixtures Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The batteries in the solar-powered light fixtures can overheat and cause the light fixture’s housing to melt, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Spiraledge Recalls Yoga Backless Chairs Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The chairs can break at the seat or back welded support rod connecting the back legs of the chair, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: Briggs & Stratton Recalls Portable Generator Fuel Tank Replacement Caps, Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The fuel tank replacement caps lack ventilation holes which allow pressure to build up in the fuel tank, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Canyon Recalls Mountain Bikes Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The chainstays can crack, which can lead to failure of the chainstay, rear wheel detachment and loss of control, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Recalls Decorative Pineapples Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The metal leaves on top of the pineapples have sharp edges, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: Marker Recalls Kingpin Ski Bindings Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The steel pins in the toe unit can break and reduce the release force of the binding, causing a fall hazard.

item.title: Metal Playground Climbers Recalled by BCI Burke Due to Strangulation Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The two welded handgrip locations at the top of the climbers can be too large creating a strangulation hazard. A child’s body could become lodged in these openings, posing a strangulation hazard.

item.title: Yamaha Recalls Golf Cars, Personal Transportation and Specialty Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The accelerator pedal return spring can break, posing a crash hazard.
